import math

def nCr(n,r):
    f = math.factorial
    return f(n) / f(r) / f(n-r)

t=input()
while t:
    t=t-1
    n,r=0,0
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    b=input()
    a.sort(reverse=True)
    for i in range(0,len(a)):
        if a[i]==a[b-1]:
            n=n+1
        if a[i]==a[b-1] and i<b:
            r=r+1
    print nCr(n,r)
